# O
## Overview
| **Feats** | **Prerequisites** | **Benefits** |
|---|---|---|
| Ocular Spell | Knowledge (dungeoneering) 4 ranks, 2 or more eyes | Cast spells as rays from eyes |
| Omnipresent Mentor | Cha 17, Inspiring Mentor | Inspire competence affects one ally for 24 hours |
| Open Minded | — | Immediately gain 5 skill points |
| Opening Volley\* | — | Successful ranged attack grants +4 on next melee attack roll |
| Opportunistic Strike\* | Dex 15+, Combat Reflexes,  Improved Combat Reflexes, base attack bonus +6 | For any attack of opportunity, you may strike twice with both strikes counting as a single attack of opportunity. |
| Opportunistic Wand | Wand Parry | You can make attacks of opportunity with wands to deliver spells |
| Orator | Skill Focus (Linguistics) | Use Linguistics instead of Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate in some instances |
| Orien Battle Stride | Any Mark of Passage | +4 bonus on checks to resist bull rush, overrun, and trip attempts; take 5-foot step when foe misses you with attack |
| Ostentatious Rager\* | Intimidate 5 ranks, rage class feature | Rage as a performance for money or to distract enemies |

  \* This is a combat feat, and can be selected as a brawler, fighter, gunslinger, swashbuckler, and warpriest bonus feat.
